dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 491 IH: Return Home to Housing Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Williams of Georgia (for herself, Ms. Tenney, Ms. Jacobs, and Mr. Garbarino) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to adjust the rate of per diem payments provided by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to grantees that provide services to homeless veterans.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Return Home to Housing Act.

section.header: Adjustments to rate of per diem payments provided by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs for services furnished to homeless veterans
section.text: Section 2012(a)(2)(B) of title 38, United States Code, is amended—

subparagraph.text: in subclause (I), by inserting , including in response to an emergency after appropriate; and
in subclause (II)(aa)(BB), by striking 115 and inserting 200; and

paragraph.text: in clause (ii), by striking 150 and inserting 200.
